text:
Stratasan - Full-Time (contact to hire), Nashville, TN - Remote possible for the right candidate.

We're looking for a upper-mid to senior-level Python developer who is also familiar with the web stack. More information on who we are and what we're looking for here:

https://gist.github.com/1028734

I'm going on an offline vacation this week so it may be next week before I can respond to emails, but I will attempt to respond to each one as soon as I return.
